Polish church to show painting depicting Jewish killing of Christian children
An 18th-century painting depicting the ritual murder of Christian children by Jews will be uncovered and available for viewing at a Polish cathedral.
This painting portrays a ritual murder that was allegedly committed by Sandomierz Jews in order to add the blood of the Christian child to Passover matzo.
http://www.timesofisrael.com/polish-church-to-show-painting-depicting-jewish-killing-of-christian-children/
Jews from Israel think that nobody believes any more seriously that Jews kill Gentile children to put their blood in matzo.
